abort.forgot_password: The Forgot Password page was detected. This normally is the result of too may failed logins. Amazon may require action before a relogin can be attempted.
abort.login_failed: Alexa Media Player failed to login.
abort.reauth_successful: Alexa Media Player successfully reauthenticated. Please ignore the "Aborted" message from HA.

error.2fa_key_invalid: Invalid Authenticator App key for Amazon 2SV
error.connection_error: Error connecting; check network and retry
error.identifier_exists: Email for Alexa URL already registered
error.unable_to_connect_hass_url: Unable to connect to Home Assistant Local URL. Please check the URL under Settings > System > Network > Home Assistant URL > Local network

data.proxy_warning: Ignore and Continue - I understand that no support for login issues are provided for bypassing this warning.

proxy_warning.description:
The HA server cannot connect to the URL provided: {hass_url}.
> {error}

To fix this, please confirm your browser can reach {hass_url}. This field is from Settings > System > Network > Home Assistant URL.

If you are **certain** your browser can reach this URL, you can bypass this warning.
proxy_warning.title: Alexa Media Player - Unable to Connect to HA URL

totp_register.title: Alexa Media Player - OTP Confirmation

data.exclude_devices: or Exclude these devices from all (comma separated)
data.hass_url: Local network URL to access Home Assistant
data.public_url: Public URL shared with external hosted services
data.queue_delay: Delay to queue multiple commands together (seconds)

deprecated_yaml_configuration.description:
YAML configuration of Alexa Media Player is deprecated
and will be removed in version 4.14.0.
There will be no automatic import of this.
Please remove it from your configuration, restart Home Assistant and use the UI to configure it instead.
Settings > Devices & services > Integrations > ADD INTEGRATION
deprecated_yaml_configuration.title: YAML configuration is deprecated

data.exclude_devices: or Exclude these devices from all (comma separated)
data.public_url: Public URL shared with external hosted services
data.queue_delay: Delay to queue multiple commands together (seconds)

force_logout.description: Force account to logout. Used mainly for debugging.

email.name: Email address

update_last_called.description: Forces update of last_called echo device for each Alexa account.
